Or 45. Re8+ Rd8 46. Ra8+ Rb8...     

Now in this position if the king and rooks were on the 6th rank instead, white would be able to play 47. Rxa6 because the rook on e6 is protected.  Of course, black still wins.

So with the king and rooks on the 8th rank ...  47. Rxb8+ Kxb8 48. Rxd8+ Kc7 and the pawns win.
